name: voize
headline: App for healthcare workers to fill out forms using speech
description: voize is the digital voice assistant for non-desk workers. Professionals like physicians, nurses, test engineers, and scientists spend over 2.5 hours on documentation every day. voize helps them finish it in minutes. The user speaks freely into a smartphone and the voize AI automatically generates structured documentation records. We transfer these documentation records into the existing enterprise software systems of the organization.

founders.name: Fabio Schmidberger, Founder
founders.description:
CEO @ voize
studied Software Engineering at the University of Stuttgart and Entrepreneurship at San Jose State University

I love road/gravel cycling, sailing, and running.

generated_description:
**voize: Revolutionizing Documentation for Healthcare Workers**

Founded in 2020 and proudly part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2022 batch, voize is tackling a significant pain point in healthcare: time-consuming documentation. With a small but mighty team of four based in Berlin, Germany, voize provides an innovative digital voice assistant designed specifically for non-desk workers, such as physicians, nurses, and engineers. These professionals can waste over 2.5 hours a day just on paperwork! 

**What’s the Big Deal?** 
The core mission of voize is straightforward yet impactful: to enable healthcare workers to fill out forms using their voice. They simply speak into their smartphone, and voize’s AI transforms those spoken words into structured documentation records. This feature dramatically cuts down on the time needed for paperwork, allowing practitioners to redirect their focus back to patient care—where it truly matters. 

The application also integrates seamlessly with existing enterprise software systems, ensuring a smooth transition and synchronization of records. 

**Why It Works**
voize stands out by developing technology that truly understands the jargon and unique demands of the healthcare environment. Its self-learning capabilities allow the AI to adapt to different dialects and noisy backgrounds, making it an invaluable tool for busy healthcare settings.

**What’s Next?**
Located in Berlin, voize aims to expand its impact in the healthcare sector and beyond, while continuously enhancing its features to support the intricate needs of its users. The team is currently working on additional integrations and exploring research projects to refine its AI and voice recognition capabilities further.

In a world where efficiency is everything, voize is not just improving the workflow; it’s reshaping the way healthcare documentation is approached. With the promise of saving valuable time and enhancing documentation quality, voize is clearly on its way to become a staple in the healthcare industry. 

For more information or to join the revolution, visit their website at [voize.de](https://voize.de/).
